name: UK Chamber of Shipping
membership: UK Chamber of Shipping is a member of Maritime UK. Maritime UK brings together the shipping, ports and maritime business services sectors in the UK to speak with a single voice on key strategic and practical issues of joint interest. Its intention is to create “joined-up” industry positions between these sectors so that the maritime message can be heard clearly and with greater weight by legislators and other audiences.
goal: The UK Chamber of Shipping is the trade association and voice for the UK shipping industry, with around 200 members from across the maritime sector. We work with Government, Parliament, international organisations and others to champion and protect the UK shipping industry on behalf of our members.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: anything involving the maritime industry in particular shipping and shipping regulation.
